Confidence Interval

Confidence interval:

For a (1-α)×100% confidence interval, we are (1-α)×100% confident that the true mean falls into the interval.

zα/2 - reliability factor, where 1-α is confidence level
x - sample mean
σx - standard error


02 Sep 2020 - Albert R.
